snippet: With discipline and poise, Sharae Turner, 24, has survived a life marked by abuse, unemployment and homelessness, including as a single mother.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, gives 24-year-old Sharae Turner, living in Covenant House in Midtown Manhattan, $200 to buy clothing suitable for job interviews.
lead_paragraph: With discipline and poise, Sharae Turner, 24, has survived a life marked by abuse, unemployment and homelessness, including as a single mother.

headline.main: She Once Worked on a Roller Coaster, and Now Her Life Resembles One
headline.print_headline: She Once Worked on a Roller Coaster, and Now Her Life Resembles One
